title: 生成带有玩家头的生物时出现”Unable to locate name/value separator for string：
author: NekomancerLeko
txt_content:
命令：

/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {ArmorItems:[{{id:"minecraft:skull",Count:1b,tag:{SkullOwner:{Id:"f84c6a79-0a4e-45e0-879b-cd49ebd4c4e2",Properties:{textures:[0:{Signature:"",Value:""}]},Name:"Herobrine"}},Damage:3s}}]}

复制代码 目的时生成一个带有him头的骷髅 [11:35:44] Data tag parsing failed: Unable to locate name/value separator for string: {id:"minecraft:skull",Count:1b,tag:{SkullOwner:{Id:"f84c6a79-0a4e-45e0-879b-cd49ebd4c4e2",Properties:{textures:[0:{Signature:"",Value:""}]},Name:"Herobrine"}},Damage:3s}复制代码 错误信息

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:diamond_helmet,Count:1,tag:{你那一长条东西放这里},Damage:3s}]}

明显是格式错误...

replies.author: NekomancerLeko
replies.txt_content: 最前面多打了一个{，删去以后还是没效果。。

replies.author: NekomancerLeko
replies.txt_content:
⊙v⊙ 发表于 2017-7-27 13:25
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {ArmorItems:[{},{},{},{id:diamond_helmet,Count:1,tag:{你那一长条东西放这里}, ...
已经自己解决了，是缺少了脚腿胸的物品信息。
